Transition Tufnell Park is part of the Transition Network, facing up to climate change and building a stronger community in Tufnell Park

Community Day

Community Day for filling the new raised beds with soil.

There will be quite a few people there. If you have any tools that would be a bonus!

Hopefully a BBQ too.

Date: Sat 25 th June

Location: Behind McCall House on Tufnell Park Road – N7 0PH

Time: 10.00 am till 4pm
